Package com.koucha.experimentalgame.input

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    InputMap.Callback
    Callback interface to be implemented for example through lambda-expressions: (evt) -> { ... }
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    InputBridge
    Takes Input through InputBridge.doMouseMovement(int, int) and InputBridge.doKeyEvent(InputEvent) and forwards it according to the InputMap
    InputEvent
    Event containing information about input from a key
    InputMap
    Maps callbacks (implementing InputMap.Callback) to key codes
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    KeyEventType
    Possible types of key actions
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
